data.eml:eml: Three new species of Entomobryoidea (Collembola: Entomobryomorpha) from Brazilian Caatinga-Cerrado transition, with identification keys to Brazilian Cyphoderus, Pseudosinella and Trogolaphysa species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Nunes, Rudy Camilo, Bellini, Bruno Cavalcante (2018): Three new species of Entomobryoidea (Collembola: Entomobryomorpha) from Brazilian Caatinga-Cerrado transition, with identification keys to Brazilian Cyphoderus, Pseudosinella and Trogolaphysa species. Zootaxa 4420 (1): 71-96, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4420.1.4
